title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.1 - Solicitors must obtain permission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.1 - Solicitors must obtain permission

State Regulations

Solicitors, salesmen, or other persons who are not on
institutional or departmental business shall obtain permission from the warden
before being admitted to an institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
53.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
